Bangladesh: Rule of the Mameluk Sultans of Delhi. (to 1281)
China: The Mongol khagan Genghis Khan died. Mozhu surrendered to the Mongol Empire during the siege of the Western Xia capital Zhongxing.
Estonia: Sword Brothers conquer Northern Estonia from Denmark.
Poland: Assassination of Leszek I the White
Russia: Boyar intrigues forced Mstislav, the prince of Novgorod, to give the throne to his son-in-law Andrew II of Hungary.
